data.Name: Real GDP
data.Definition: gross domestic product of Uzbekistan in local currency unit calculated at constant prices by the production method with reference to previous year's price.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: GDP per capita
data.Definition: average annual income of the people in Uzbekistan (annual real GDP     divided by the annual population number in UZS. It is the ratio of real GDP to the annual permanent population.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Real GDP
data.Definition: annual percentage change in real GDP values.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: GDP structure
data.Definition: percentage share of value added in GDP by the agriculture sector in Uzbekistan.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: GDP structure
data.Definition: percentage share of value added in GDP by the industry sector in Uzbekistan
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: GDP structure
data.Definition: percentage share of value added in GDP by the service sector in Uzbekistan
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: CPI
data.Definition: annual percentage change in the price of a basket of commodities based on SA calculation of price data in the consumer market. It shows the changes in the value of inflation in the economy for a fixed set of consumer goods and services consumed by the population in Uzbekistan.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Export and import values of goods and services in million USD. Export:
data.Definition: transaction of goods and services from Uzbekistan to a foreign state in monetary value, in million USD
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Export and import values of goods and services in million USD. Import:
data.Definition: transaction of goods and services from a foreign state to Uzbekistan in monetary value, in million USD.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Share of low-income population
data.Definition: the share of the population below income estimates of  2 100 kilocalories per day, as recommended by the World Bank. It shows the percentage of the population with income less than a given amount.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Gini coefficient
data.Definition: an index number between 0 in the case of perfect income equality and 1 in the case of perfect   income inequality based on the comparison of cumulative proportions of the population against cumulative proportions of income they receive.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Labor force
data.Definition: the proportion of the population aged 15 and older that is economically active during a specified period.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Employment
data.Definition: persons of working age engaged in any activity to produce goods or provide services for pay or profit, whether at work during the reference period or not at work due to temporary absence from a job or working-time arrangement. The employment rate here in the report is a proportion (percentage) of the labour force employed
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Employment by sector
data.Definition: percentage of total employment by agriculture sector of the economy
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: Employment by sector
data.Definition: percentage of total employment by industry sector of the economy
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: Employment by sector
data.Definition: percentage of total employment by service sector of the economy
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: School gross enrolment ratio
data.Definition: the ratio of total enrolment, regardless of age, to the population of the age group that officially corresponds to the level of education shown-at primary levels.
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: School gross enrolment ratio
data.Definition: the ratio of total enrolment, regardless of age, to the population of the age group that officially corresponds to the level of education at secondary level.
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: School gross enrolment ratio
data.Definition: the ratio of total enrolment, regardless of age, to the population of the age group that officially corresponds to the level of education at tertiary level.
data.Source: World Bank

data.Name: Total population
data.Definition: Number of people permanently living in Uzbekistan at the beginning of the year.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Life expectancy
data.Definition: average number of years a newborn infant in Uzbekistan would live if prevailing patterns of mortality at the time of its birth were to stay the same throughout its life.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Life expectancy
data.Definition: average number of years a newborn infant male in Uzbekistan would live.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Life expectancy
data.Definition: average number of years a newborn infant  female in Uzbekistan would live.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Net external migration
data.Definition: the net total of migrants during the period (i.e. the number of immigrants minus the number of emigrants, including citizens and noncitizens)
data.Source: World Bank
